mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.photo AS "photo", a.name AS "name", a.member_ids AS "memberIds", a.person_num AS "personNum", a.group_id AS "group.id", c.name AS "group.name", a.position AS "position", a.position_x AS "positionX", a.position_y AS "positionY", a.captain AS "captain", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", u.name AS "createBy.name", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN cms_category c ON c.id = a.group_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team( id, photo, name, person_num, group_id, position, position_x, position_y, captain, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remarks, member_ids ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{photo}, #{name}, #{personNum}, #{group.id}, #{position}, #{positionX}, #{positionY}, #{captain}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks}, #{memberIds} )
mapper.update: UPDATE team SET photo = #{photo}, name = #{name}, person_num = #{personNum}, group_id = #{group.id}, position = #{position}, position_x = #{positionX}, position_y = #{positionY}, captain = #{captain}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, member_ids = #{memberIds} WHERE id = #{id}
